FuncDef: The reset call rate command clears the call rate statistics of users.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display call rate command can be used to check call rate statistics for all types of users. If the display call rate command has been run many times, there will be too many packet statistics, which makes the analysis difficult. In this case, running the reset call rate command can reset the statistics.
The statistics cleared by the reset call rate command include the number of calls, number of successful calls, and call put-through rate for PPP authentication users, 802.1X authentication users, Web/Fast authentication users, and binding authentication users.
After the reset call rate is command to clear the call rate statistics, the cleared statistics cannot be restored.
Precautions
If the reset call rate command is run during users' login, an error will occur in the final call rate statistics.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
